results.content: Would have been more helpful if the lessons are based on complex, finished products so that students get full context on how the methods are applied in multiple scenarios at one-go.

response.content: There are over 100 small projects and coding example that can be used together to build larger projects, they all work independently and can be combined but depends on the needs of the app and the endpoint.  This is about connecting to an endpoint and then using the data which differs endpoint to endpoint

results.content: It is the third class I follow from Laurence. I know he knows everything and he can lose me sometimes. But this class is chapter after chapter didactic and clear. I'm creating requests through an API for the first time and all my doubts are being clarified step by step, especially the way to "loop" through Objects. This is a perfect ten for clarity and significance.

response.content: Glad you enjoyed the course. Thank you for your feedback and review.
